Reviews.Title: Marketed as "Sony" Buyer Beware!
Reviews.Author: William T.
Reviews.Content: "I received the cameras that were advertised as "Sony" CCD CCTV Cameras but they are just Zmodo's standard middle of the road cameras. Buyer Beware! These cameras have a decent picture but certainly not anything like the other comments by other "purchasers" hmmm.... The standard Zmodo cameras that came with my DVR actually have a much clearer and brighter picture. Look around before you buy."

Reviews.Title: A Blurry Waste of Money2
Reviews.Author: Hicoteo
Reviews.Content: These are very nice compact inconspicuous cameras. The IR is not too bad. You can make out things perhaps 40 feet away in dim light.However, when it comes down to it image quality is everything and the image with these is horrendous! It is blurry and I cannot even recognize people I know from 15 feet away. I use these for apartment building security and have already accused the wrong person of leaving a door open because of the poor image.I am very disappointed with this purchase. I thought I was buying better then average cameras because the ad says Sony and for the longer reach IR. If I didn't live overseas I would return them.If there is a way of focusing these things please let me know and maybe I can bump the rating up. I'm annoyed!

Reviews.Title: OEM product
Reviews.Author: DontBelieveTheHype
Reviews.Content: I thought I was ripped off when I received a plain brown box and cameras that do not say ZMODO on them.  Seller replied that they are OEM from ZMODO, a little misleading on their part.  They are pretty good for the money but don't expect to see detail or more than 20 ft. in the dark.

Reviews.Title: Great cameras
Reviews.Author: Wayne L Bolin
Reviews.Content: great bang for the buck.these have great color and the 24 IR LEDs really show up at night.  You won't be sorry, A least I wasn't

Reviews.Title: Camera set
Reviews.Author: Jim Weadon
Reviews.Content: installed easily the definition of the camera are good for the price I have been using these for awhile now and am extremely satisfied

Reviews.Title: good camera !!!  great price !!!!
Reviews.Author: stick
Reviews.Content: these cameras where an add on to my dvr security system, there small and not very noticeable. they have a great color picture on them in the day time and they see in the dark in black and white. work great !!! I would recommend them because I'm very happy with them !

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price and the quality
Reviews.Author: R.J.Camera
Reviews.Content: These have exceeded my expectation and I was surprised that for the price I wasn't sure the positive reviews were accurate. I would say you can't go wrong for the money

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Celson Hubner Junior
Reviews.Content: I look by internet in site amazon.I  by for me and my son.I recommended For every oneThe price is very good
